name: Case Files with Kat and Ashley

episodes.title: S. 7 Episode 28: Teal Swan: Spiritual Catalyst or Cult Leader?
episodes.description: TW: This episode contains discussions of childhood sexual abuse, suicide, and suicidal ideation. These are deeply sensitive topics that may be distressing for some listeners. Please take care of yourself as you listen. If you or someone you know is struggling, help is available. You can call or text the Suicide & Crisis Lifeline at 988 anytime, 24/7. Teal Swan is a self-proclaimed spiritual healer, author, and YouTube influencer with a devoted following—and a deeply controversial reputation. In this episode, Kat gets fired up as she explores the enigmatic figure behind The Deep End docuseries, the explosive Gateway podcast, and a mountain of public debate. We unpack her origin story, her controversial teachings on suicide and trauma, and the allegations of cult-like behavior swirling around her inner circle. Is Teal Swan a misunderstood healer... or something much darker? Grab a drink and join us! REFERENCES: https://tealswan.com/about-teal/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teal_Swan https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-gateway-teal-swan/id1387560474 https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-cult-of-teal-swan/id1566917047?i=1000567970355 https://www.amazon.com/The-Deep-End-Season-1/dp/B09X2C1RB1 https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bigger-than-the-pope-jennings-brown-on-teal-swan/id1553334816?i=1000563235613 https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bigger-than-the-pope-jennings-brown-on-teal-swan/id1553334816?i=1000564488976 https://thesatanictemple.com/blogs/grey-faction/how-teal-swan-s-therapist-started-a-mormon-satanic-panic?srsltid=AfmBOopYX5oXk_QYzprI_bOh2y5XvYbQIRh84nqPqRAyro8GB8y9qCc5 Please like, follow, and share this podcast - we're on all of the platforms! Oh, and please leave reviews so other true crime lovers can find us. If you are trying to get a hold of us, we can only respond via: Case Files with Kat and Ashley Facebook Instagram FOR HELP WITH STALKING OR CYBERSTALKING: https://rainn.org/news/resources-survivors-stalking-and-cyberstalking FOR HELP WITH DOMESTIC VIOLENCE: https://www.thehotline.org/get-help/domestic-violence-local-resources/ IN HOUSTON AREA: https://www.bayareaturningpoint.org/ FOR HELP WITH SEXUAL ASSAULT: https://rainn.org/resources SUICIDE & CRISIS HELPLINE: 988 - 24/7 Help if you or someone you know if struggling. YOU ARE NOT ALONE.

episodes.title: Roch Thériault & The Ant Hill Kids Cult - Pt. 3
episodes.description: Join us for the FINAL installment of Kat's deep-dive into French-Canadian cult leader Roch Thériault, & his band of followers, The Ant Hill Kids. This is the WORST of the 3 episodes, so there are trigger warnings for ALL OF IT, but especially abuse against women and children.Seriously, don't let kids listen to this episode!References:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mowEU6uD2xshttps://www.cultfacts.com/cults/ant-hill-kidshttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JJnWsbjxSzs&t=843shttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seventh-day_Adventist_Churchhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roch_Th%C3%A9riaulthttps://www.toronto.com/news/crime/behind-the-crimes-murder-mutilation-abuse-part-of-life-at-ant-hill-kids-commune/article_70440d6e-a838-5b34-856d-b696402a10c9.html?https://maryboro.ca/story/roch-theriault-and-the-ant-hill-kids/https://medium.com/@filiphristovreligion/the-ant-hill-kids-in-about-100-words-4b5f2cb95b31https://zeph456.medium.com/the-ant-hill-kids-c85d46a1eb2ahttps://www.mirror.co.uk/news/us-news/chilling-insight-doomsday-cult-members-13995059https://www.ranker.com/list/kids-of-famous-cult-leaders-where-are-they-now/jacob-sheltonhttps://imgur.com/gallery/QtSQzhttps://www.spiritualchildhoods.ca/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/Moi%CC%88se-The%CC%81riault%E2%80%99s-Group-RELG-316.pdfhttps://www.ranker.com/list/roch-moise-theriault-facts/stefanie-hammond

episodes.title: Roch Thériault & The Ant Hill Kids Cult - Pt. 2
episodes.description: Join us for PART 2 of Kat's deep-dive into French-Canadian cult leader Roch Thériault, & his band of followers, The Ant Hill Kids. This episode gets DARK, so we are making a trigger warning for so many things, especially abuse against women and children.Ashley is still out of town, so Sarah Sarah is back! You might need to grab a stiffer drink than a beer for this one. episodes.title: Roch Thériault & The Ant Hill Kids Cult - Pt. 1
episodes.description: Join us this week as Kat begins her deep dive into Roch Thériault & The Ant Hill Kids Cult. You may never have heard of the Canadian cult, but Kat will definitely make you want to learn more. Ashley is out of town, so she is joined by none other than Sarah-Sarah! Grab a beer and enjoy this week's twisted beginning to the Ant Hill Kids Cult Saga. REFERENCES:https://www.amazon.com/Savage-Messiah-Paul-Kaihla/dp/0770425976https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/episode-434-roch-th%C3%A9riault-the-ant-hill-kids-part-i/id437299706?i=1000549630074https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mowEU6uD2xshttps://www.cultfacts.com/cults/ant-hill-kidshttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JJnWsbjxSzs&t=843shttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seventh-day_Adventist_Churchhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roch_Th%C3%A9riaulthttps://www.toronto.com/news/crime/behind-the-crimes-murder-mutilation-abuse-part-of-life-at-ant-hill-kids-commune/article_70440d6e-a838-5b34-856d-b696402a10c9.html?https://maryboro.ca/story/roch-theriault-and-the-ant-hill-kids/https://medium.com/@filiphristovreligion/the-ant-hill-kids-in-about-100-words-4b5f2cb95b31https://zeph456.medium.com/the-ant-hill-kids-c85d46a1eb2ahttps://www.mirror.co.uk/news/us-news/chilling-insight-doomsday-cult-members-13995059https://www.ranker.com/list/kids-of-famous-cult-leaders-where-are-they-now/jacob-sheltonhttps://imgur.com/gallery/QtSQz

episodes.title: S. 4 Episode 3- Cult Leader Amy Carlson/Love Has Won
episodes.description: This week Kat tells us all about a woman who abandoned her children, cussed like a sailor, drank 12 shots of vodka a night, claimed to have been Jesus, Joan of Arc, Marilyn Monroe (and so many more people!) in a former life and said she could give people psychic surgeries to cure cancer. Oh and she called herself Mother God...because she is the creator of the universe. Duh! Enjoy the episode about Amy Carlson and her cult "Love Has Won".Resources:https://coloradosun.com/2021/05/04/love-has-won-amy-carlson-murder/ - By Thomas Peipert, The Associated Presshttps://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2021/05/05/love-has-won-cult-leader-dead/ - By Marisa Iati https://gurumag.com/love-has-won-cult-leader-found-deceased-near-crestone-members-arrested/ - By BE SCOFIELDhttps://www.thedailybeast.com/corpse-found-in-colorado-cult-of-so-called-cult-love-has-won-led-by-amy-carlson?ref=scroll - By Carol McKinley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Love_Has_Won https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/love-has-won-christopher-royer-b1854574.html - By: Justin Vallejo  https://kesq.com/news/national-world/2021/05/21/love-has-won-cult-reappears-online-under-new-name/ - CNN https://www.vice.com/en/article/v7mwvb/love-has-won-vice-documentary The Dr. Phil Show - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hOOv4Zkgu6s
